identity.mission: Create a 'Dark Academia Tech' coaching platform that feels like a Mission Control center for academic success. Serious, high-contrast, and professional.
principles: Fusion: Mix 'Swiss Poster' precision with 'Control Room' density.
Content: Data is the hero. Charts and numbers must pop against the dark background.
Contrast: High contrast text for readability in dark mode. Neon accents for status.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Big metrics

mono.usage: Net scores, Dates, IDs, Tabular data

rules: Overlines (small labels) must be wide: tracking-widest uppercase text-xs.
Never use pure white (#FFFFFF) for text. Use slate-50 or slate-100.

hero_background.usage: Landing page hero background with low opacity overlay

student_focus.usage: Student dashboard welcome or login side image

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-500 text-white shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(99,102,241,0.5)] transition-all duration-300

cards.base: bg-slate-900/60 backdrop-blur-md border border-slate-800 rounded-xl p-6

inputs.base: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-indigo-500 text-slate-100 placeholder:text-slate-600

charts.style: Use dark tooltips (bg-slate-900 border-slate-800). Lines should be thin (strokeWidth={2}) and use neon colors (indigo, emerald, amber).

landing.structure: Hero (Full height) -> Features (Bento Grid) -> Testimonials -> CTA

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force dark mode in tailwind.config.js or apply 'dark' class to html/body.
3. FONTS: Import 'Outfit', 'Inter', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components but OVERRIDE the default styles with the 'glassmorphism' classes defined above.
5. CHARTS: When building the Statistics page, use Recharts. Ensure the X/Y axis lines are subtle (#334155) and the data lines are vibrant.
6. PDF: Use 'jspdf' and 'html2canvas' for the PDF export functionality.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients. No 'Inter' for headings.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to everything. Cards should lift slightly.
Empty States: Never leave a dashboard empty. Show 'No students assigned' with a helpful illustration or icon.
Data Density: This is a coaching tool. Don't be afraid of density, but keep it organized with whitespace.
